page.title: 13St Andrew's Church Choir
page.content: I belong to the{church choir}and we sing at a lot of services. There is also a{junior choir}which I belonged to when I was younger - their{practice is at church from 6.20 - 7.20 each Friday night; the main choir practice follows from 7.30 - 9.00. There is {evensong}and{morning service}every Sunday except once a month when the junior choir sing at the morning service. There are also{weddings}that we sometime sing at.{Christmas}is a very busy time for us and so is{Easter time because there are a lot of services for us to sing at. In the summer holidays we don't have to go to the services. This year the choir went on an{outing}to Winchester.
